page.title: 12Draycott Primary School
page.content:
The primary school in this area known as Draycott-in-the-Moors is Draycott Manor County Primary School. Children aged between 4 and 11 attend this school of about 100 pupils. Currently in the year beginning September 1985 there are 4.5 staff including the headmaster Mr.M.Clark and the deputy Mr.R.Rawson.
During these difficult times of falling school rolls it seems that Draycott Manor has reached its minimum number of pupils. The signs are that there will be a slow increase over the next few years.
